frege.runtime

Class Array

  • java.lang.Object
    • frege.runtime.Array
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class Array
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

    Mutable array of frege values.

    Used to realize type Prelude.Array elem s.

    This is not a pure type.

      • arraySet

        public static final <T> void arraySet(T[] arr,
                int i,
                T v)

        Update array destructively. This method is not pure!

        Parameters:
        arr - the array
        i - index into arr
        v - new value to set at index i

        Changes the passed array, therefore it is not pure. Because the return type is void there is no way to make the frege compiler believe it is pure.

      • arrayGet

        public static final <T> T arrayGet(T[] arr,
             int i)

        Get array element.

        Parameters:
        arr - the array
        i - index into arr
        Returns:
        the value at index i, which may be null

      • arrayLen

        public static final <T> int arrayLen(T[] arr)

        Get array length.

        Parameters:
        arr - the array
        Returns:
        arr.length
